description: Apple's annual developer conference could mark the debut of a brand-new mixed reality platform, several new Mac computers and a look at the future for iOS and MacOS.

title: After Launching a 3D-Printed Rocket Into Space, This Company Is Going Bigger     - CNET
description: Relativity Space launched its Terran 1 rocket earlier this year. Now it's turning its efforts to the much larger Terran R rocket capable of bringing large payloads into orbit.

title: States With Deregulated Energy: The Pros and Cons of Choosing Your Energy Provider     - CNET
description: Deregulated energy allows you to choose who you buy your energy from. But not every state is deregulated.
